articles.author: Ralph Ellis and Marlena Baldacci, CNN
articles.title: Zachary Cruz, brother of Parkland shooter, arrested
articles.description: Police have arrested Zachary Cruz, the younger brother of Parkland, Florida, school shooter Nikolas Cruz, for allegedly violating the terms of his probation.

articles.title: Kanye West called slavery a choice. TMZ's Van Lathan gave a forceful — and thoughtful — rebuke.
articles.description: After Kanye West tells TMZ that slavery was a 'choice,' one of the men on the show replied, “You have morphed into something, to me, that’s not real.”

articles.author: https://www.nytimes.com/by/jose-a-del-real
articles.title: Official Autopsy of Stephon Clark Questions Earlier Findings
articles.description: An official report calls into question a private autopsy that found an unarmed black man was hit primarily while facing away from two Sacramento police officers.

articles.author: Rob Price
articles.title: One thing was missing from Mark Zuckerberg's big speech — and it signals a major shift for Facebook
articles.description: BI PRIME: The future of Facebook is Instagram, WhatsApp, and Oculus — just don't talk about the Newsfeed.

articles.title: Mueller raised possibility of presidential subpoena in meeting with Trump's legal team
articles.description: The tense March encounter kicked off turmoil among Trump’s lawyers and led to the development of a list of questions the president’s team expects he would be asked.

articles.author: Katie Rogers and Lawrence K. Altman, M.D.
articles.title: Trump's Onetime Physician Says Trump Aides Raided His Office, Describing a Year of 'Torture'
articles.description: President Trump’s longtime physician said Tuesday that he was aggressively cut out of the Trump orbit early last year and that two aides seized Mr. Trump’s medical records without authorization.

articles.author: James Queally
articles.title: Man driving RV with children on board leads police in pursuit across Los Angeles and Kern counties
articles.description: A dispute between a husband and wife sparked a wild police pursuit involving a motor home on Tuesday afternoon, authorities said.

articles.author: Al Baker and Sean Piccoli
articles.title: Veterinarian Charged With Smuggling Heroin Inside Puppies
articles.description: More than 12 years after the dogs were found, Andres Lopez Elorez was arraigned on federal charges of conspiring to import and distribute narcotics.

articles.author: Ann Zaniewski
articles.title: School backs off plans for 'modesty ponchos' at prom
articles.description: The ponchos were widely criticized and ridiculed on social media. Some girls decided to seek alterations or hunt for a new dress.

articles.author: Aaron Pressman
articles.title: How Can Apple Keep Growing If Its Current Growth Depends on iPhone Price Hikes?

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/amber.j.phillips
articles.title: 'Cocaine Mitch': This West Virginia Senate GOP candidate takes anti-establishment politics off the rails
articles.description: Don Blankenship seems to be doing everything he can to make sure Mitch McConnell sinks him.

articles.author: http://www.facebook.com/matt.zapotosky
articles.title: 'The Department of Justice is not going to be extorted': Rosenstein responds to impeachment threat
articles.description: President Trump’s conservative allies in the House have drafted articles of impeachment for the Justice Department’s No. 2 official.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/kevin.sieff
articles.title: Despite Trump threats, US officials allow caravan members to seek asylum
articles.description: Some of the president’s supporters still see his campaign against the migrants as a victory.

articles.author: Valerie Kalfrin
articles.title: My Son Finally Has a Hero Like Him in 'Avengers: Infinity War' (Guest Column)
articles.description: Don Cheadle and Marvel Studios have taken great — and graceful — strides in representing disability.

articles.title: Details of US-North Korea summit could be announced soon, Trump says
articles.description: President Donald Trump said Tuesday that the date and location for what will be a historic meeting between a sitting American president and the leader of North Korea over denuclearization could be announced by the end of the week.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/dlamothe
articles.title: US soldier killed in Afghanistan was part of Pentagon's counterterrorism mission
articles.description: Army Spec. Gabriel D. Conde, 22, was on his first deployment.

articles.author: Ashley Imlay
articles.title: Utah teen speaks out after prom dress sparks worldwide debate
articles.description: When Keziah Daum posted prom photos on Twitter, she never would've guessed that they would be seen by hundreds of thousands of people worldwide, spurring criticism from many who called her choice...

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Tiger cub abandoned in duffel bag at US-Mexico border
articles.description: The cub was unconscious and stuffed inside a duffel bag when officers discovered it.

articles.author: http://www.nytimes.com/by/hiroko-tabuchi, https://www.nytimes.com/by/coral-davenport
articles.title: California Sues Trump Administration Over Car Emissions Rules
articles.description: The state's move escalates a revolt against a proposed rollback of fuel economy standards that threatens to split the country’s auto market.

articles.title: Trump welcomes hero Southwest pilot
articles.description: Southwest Air 1380 pilot Tammie Jo Shults and other crew members and passengers will visit the White House today. Follow here for the latest.
